title: Why does my teacher not talk to me anymore? - Quora

response.answer_text: You were horrible in bed? You have bad breath? You never tipped? You dress for the winter even in the summer “just in case “ You drive a 1978 pinto that could explode any minute? You still sleep with your parents during thunder storms and they’ve been dead 6 years?

I don’t know. Can you give more details? There’s a million possible scenarios: your teacher could be dead; busy; moved to another state; busy; upset at you for something you did; busy; short-sighted and did not see you when you walked by; busy; ……. oh did I mention your teacher could be busy? No seriously, need more details.
